Translations.Text: ‘‘nivu yaredege nannannu amantrisuttiruviro atanige i lokadallagali paralokadallagali khandita yava sthanavu illa. Konege navellaru allahanedege maralabekagide. Mattu atikramigale naraka vasigalaguvaru’’
‘‘naniga nimage heluttiruvudannu bahu begane nivu nenapisikolluviri. Nanu nanna visayavannu allahanige oppisiruvenu. Khanditavagiyu allahanu dasara mele kannittittiruttane’’
konege allahanu atanannu avara dusta sancugalinda raksisidanu mattu hinaya sikseyondu phir‌aun‌na balagavannu avarisikonditu

Munjaneyu sanjeyu avarannu benkiya munde hajaru padisalaguttade. (Punarut'thanada) nirnayaka ghaligeyu bandubittaga, ‘‘phir‌aunana balagavannu atyanta ghora sikseyolakke talliri’’ (endu adesisalaguvudu)

mattu avaru narakadolage paraspara jagaladuvaru. (Ihalokadalli) durbalaragiddavaru, doddastike mereyuttiddavarodane heluvaru; ‘‘(alli) navu nimage adhinaragiddevu. Niviga i benkiyannu svalpa mattigadaru nam'minda nivarisaballira?’’
(Ihadalli) doddastike mereyuttiddavaru heluvaru; ‘‘idiga navellaru idarolagiddeve. Allahanu igagale dasara naduve tirpu nidi bittiddane’’
narakadolagiruvavaru, adara kavalugararodane, ‘‘ondu dinada mattigadaru nam'ma palige sikseyannu tusu haguragolisabekendu nim'ma odeyanannu prarthisiri’’ ennuvaru

avaru (kavalugararu), ‘‘nim'ma balige nim'ma dutaru spasta puravegalondige bandiralillave?’’ Endu keluvaru. Avaru, ‘‘haudu bandiddaru’’ ennuvaru. Aga avaru (kavalugararu) heluvaru; ‘‘hagadare nive prarthisiri. Dhikkarigala prarthaneyu sada nisphalavagiruttade’’
navu nam'ma dutarige hagu visvasigalige i lokadallu, (munde paralokadalli) saksigalu nilluva dinavu khandita neravaguvevu
andu akramigalige, avaru huduva nepagalinda yava labhavu agadu. Avaru ninditaragiruvaru mattu atyanta nikrsta neleyu avaradagiruvudu
navu musarige margadarsana nididdevu mattu isra'ilara santatigalannu granthada (taurat‌na) uttaradhikarigalagi madidevu
adu (taurat) bud'dhiyullavara palige margadarsi hagu sadupadesavagide

(Dutare,) nivu sahanasilaragiri. Allahanu kotta matu khandita satyavagide. Mattu nivu nim'ma papagaligagi ksameyannu bediri. Hagu sanje, munjanegalalli nim'modeyana gunagana madutta avana pavitravannu japisiri

khanditavagiyu, tam'ma balige (allahana kadeyinda) yavude pramana bandilladiddaru, allahana vacanagala visayadalli jagaladuvavara manas'sugalalli (tave mahanaremba) ahankara tumbide. Adare, avarendu adannu (mahanateyannu) sadhisalararu. Nivu allahana raksaneyannu koriri. Avanu khandita ellavannu keluvavanu hagu noduvavanagiddane
akasagala hagu bhumiya srstiyu manavara srstiginta dodda sadhaneyagide. Adare, heccina manavaru idannu aritilla
kurudanu mattu kanuvavanu samanaralla. Nambikeyullavaru, satkarmagalannu maduvavaru mattu duracaragalinda dura uliyuvavaru (itararantalla). Nivu upadesa svikarisuvudu tira kadime
(lokantyada) a ksanavu khandita baralide. Adaralli sandehave illa. Adare janaralli heccinavaru nambuvudilla
nim'ma odeyanu heliruvanu; nivu nannannu prarthisiri, nanu nimage uttara niduvenu. Nannannu aradhisuva visayadalli ahambhava toruvavaru khanditavagiyu apamanitaragi narakavannu pravesisuvaru

nivu visranti paduvudakkagi nimagagi ratriyannu rupisidavanu hagu hagalannu belagisidavanu allahanu. Allahanu tanna dasara palige khandita udariyagiddane. Adare, janaralli heccinavaru krtajnate sallisuvudilla
avane nim'ma odeyanada allah. Avanu ella vastugala srstikarta. Avana horatu bere devarilla. Higirutta nivu adelli aleyuttiruviri
allahana vacanagala visayadalli jagaladuvavaru ide riti aleyuttiruttare

Allahane nim'ma palige bhumiyannu vasada neleyagisidavanu mattu akasavannu capparavagisidavanu mattu nimage rupavannu nididavanu hagu nim'ma rupavannu andagolisidavanu mattu nirmala vastugala mulaka nimage aharavannu odagisidavanu. Avane nim'ma odeyanada allah. Ella lokagala odeyanada allahanu tumba samrd'dhanu
avanu (allahanu) sada jivantanu. Avana horatu bere devarilla. Nistheyannu avanobbanige misalagittu, avanannu prarthisiri. Ella prasansegalu, ella lokagala odeyanada allahanige misalu

(dutare,) heliri; nanna balige nanna odeyana kadeyinda spastavada pramanagalu bandiruvaga, allahana horatu nivu prarthisuvavugalannu nanu pujisabaradendu nannannu tadeyalagide. Mattu nanu ella lokagala odeyanige saranagabekendu nanage adesisalagide

avane nim'mannu (modalu) mannininda, a balika viryadinda mattu a balika mansa pindadinda srstisidavanu. Taruvaya avanu nim'mannu (tayiya garbhadinda) sisuvagi horategeyuttane – nivu yavvanavannu talupalu hagu a balika vrd'dharagi bidalu. Nim'malli kelavaru adakke munnave mrtaragi biduttare mattu (itararu ulidiruttare) – nivu ondu nirdista avadhiyannu talupabeku hagu bud'dhivantaragabekendu
